Package au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh

Class PassportAuthenticationConverter

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.security.oauth2.server.resource.authentication.JwtAuthenticationConverter
au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh.PassportAuthenticationConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt,org.springframework.security.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationToken>
@Component @Profile("server & ga4gh") public class PassportAuthenticationConverter extends org.springframework.security.oauth2.server.resource.authentication.JwtAuthenticationConverter
Examines a JWT, works out the passport filters and adds the appropriate Pathling authorities to the security context.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Constructor Details

    • PassportAuthenticationConverter

      public PassportAuthenticationConverter(@Nonnull VisaDecoderFactory visaDecoderFactory, @Nonnull ServerConfiguration configuration, @Nonnull ManifestConverter manifestConverter, @Nonnull PassportScope passportScope)
      Parameters:
      visaDecoderFactory - a factory for creating a visa JwtDecoder
      configuration - for use in creating the JWT decoder
      manifestConverter - a ManifestConverter that we use to convert the manifest into a set of query scopes
      passportScope - a request-scoped PassportScope used to store the extracted filters
